document.heading: Student Access to Treatment Act of 2007

history.narrative: Law 17-107, the “Student Access to Treatment Act of 2007”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-134 which was referred to the Committee on Health. The Bill was adopted on first reading on October 23, 2007. Signed by the Mayor on December 3, 2007, it was assigned Act No. 17-226 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-107 became effective on February 2, 2008.
